name: RealFlight Content File
summary: Learn about .G3X files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: G3X files are stored as compressed Zip archives. They can be imported into RealFlight using the following option: Simulation → Import → RealFlight Archive.

description: File used by RealFlight, a program used for flight simulation and training; contains a model of an airplane, helicopter, or other flight simulator object; used to create custom RealFlight content.
